Author: jaxxxxxxyyyy
Content: I suggested Alexei to not only get the recruits from urban areas, but also rural areas for recruits. The main aim of the militia is at first to defend protesters when the polices are coming. Alexei himself run a security company thus it is a good thing that if he active and willing to do it, he can start training basic recruits with basic security standard. Arming them with basic security equipment. This is the first few steps that we should focusing on to begin with. We need 100 men to begin with at the very least.
